alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 6:55AM EST until December 23 at 8:46PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek At Cold Brook. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. Water begins to overflow banks above Ashokan Reservoir with little damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:31 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage later this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.5 feet on 10/20/1989. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 6 am: 9.2 Forecast: Fri 7 am 10.9 Fri 1 pm 11.5 Fri 7 pm 9.8 Sat 1 am 8.3 Sat 7 am 7.5 Sat 1 pm 7.0 Sat 7 pm 6.6 Sun 1 am 6.3 Sun 7 am 6.1 Sun 1 pm MSG Sun 7 pm MSG Mon 1 am MSG &&
